document_data.caption: A map showing Vondil Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Vondil Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Vondil Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Vondil Street was located in the easterm section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran east to west, originating on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] and passing west to eventually end on [[Diamond Street]]. Along the way Vondil Street was intersected by [[Mendever Street]], [[Sul Street]], [[Shield Street]], and [[Copper Street]].
